reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Gestione Integrata delle Risorse Naturali nell' Unione delle Municipalità di Tiro

description.narrative: Contribuire al miglioramento della qualità di vita, delle condizioni di igiene e alla gestione dell’ambiente nell’Unione di Municipalità di Tiro - Migliorare le condizioni igieniche e ambientali in 9 Municipalità dell’Unione di Tiro attraverso la gestione integrata dei RSU

Contribute to improve of life quality, hygiene conditions and management of the environment in the Union of Tire Municipalities - Improve the hygiene and environmental conditions in 9 Municipalities of the Union of Tire through integrated management of MSW

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
INTERSOS - ORGANIZZAZIONE UMANITARIA PER L'EMERGENZA ONG/ON

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
Decentralisation and support to subnational government

tag.narrative: By 2030, improve water quality by reducing pollution, eliminating dumping and minimizing release of hazardous chemicals and materials, halving the proportion of untreated wastewater and substantially increasing recycling and safe reuse globally
By 2030, reduce the adverse per capita environmental impact of cities, including by paying special attention to air quality and municipal and other waste management
By 2030, substantially reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse
Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)
